snippet.title: Taur Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1227780/Taur/?utm_source=yt&utm_medium=yt&utm_campaign=desc

Coming February 20, 2020

Taur is an indie action-strategy sci-fi game. Inspired by a multitude of games in classic genres such as tower defense, shooter, real-time strategy and more, creating a unique type of gameplay.
